# Common Override Patterns

*   **Status**: âœ… Active & Auto-Generated
*   **Last Updated**: 2025-11-11
*   **AuditTag**: `Phase10.3`

This document summarizes common scenarios where contributors have chosen to override validator decisions. This data is used by the Governance Evolution Engine to propose new rules.

| Validator           | Common Rationale for Override      | Contributor Frequency | Proposed Action                               |
|---------------------|------------------------------------|-----------------------|-----------------------------------------------|
| `DensityValidator`  | "Known sparse handwritten style"   | 85%                   | **Accepted**: Soften threshold for this lineage. |
| `ContrastValidator` | "Intentional low-contrast variant" | 40%                   | **Monitoring**: No change, but tracking trend.    |
| `StructureValidator`| "Minimalist symbol design"         | 15%                   | **Rejected**: Threshold maintained for clarity.   |
